entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
